LanguageData.sd_luciprod_rawlucibatch.label: raw luciferium batch
LanguageData.sd_luciprod_rawlucibatch.description: The raw luciferium batch needs one production step to make luciferium pills at the drub lab.(recipe requires neutroamine)
LanguageData.sd_luciprod_mechanite_oil.label: mechanite oil
LanguageData.sd_luciprod_mechanite_oil.description: This is the mechanite version of human blood. It contains trace amounts of small mechanites which help powering these huge machines from within.
LanguageData.sd_luciprod_prep_mech_corpse.label: prepared mechanoid corpse
LanguageData.sd_luciprod_prep_mech_corpse.description: The corpse of a mechanoid prepared for the stasis pod to produce mechanites for the luciferium production. It can be disasssembled at the machining table if not needed.
